transcript:
Customer: Hello?

Customer: Hello?


Executive: Hello?
Customer: Hello? Ji sir good afternoon, Hoshiyabad kar rahe ho na, Mandal sir.
Executive: Oh acha acha Shreya ji kaise ho aap?
Customer: Main theek hoon sir, Mandal sir?
Executive: Sorry? Hello?
Customer: Mandal sir baat.
Executive: Haan ji boliye.
Customer: Haan haan sir. Ye number aapke paas hai na office mein? Hmm.
Executive: Haan office mein hoon, office mein mere paas hai ye number, main kaam kar raha tha.
Customer: Sir aapke paas mera number hai toh sahi aap call kar lete, aapne toh ticket hi open kar di.
Executive: Kya open kar di?
Customer: Video meet ki, video meet ki request dali thi na?
Executive: Oh video meet ki request galti se on ho gaya tha, woh main pehle check kar raha tha buyer se interest toh galti se video meet mein aap le gaya tha.
Customer: Koi baat nahi sir, abhi aapko koi zarurat ho toh main kar sakti hoon, koi dikkat nahi hai.
Executive: Nahi nahi nahi, filhaal toh koi baat nahi hai, main aise hi check kar raha hoon, leads check kar raha tha aise open kar.
Customer: Acha acha, abhi sab theek chal raha hai sir phir catalog pe?
Executive: Ek dam theek, ek dam theek thak, ek dam theek thak, theek thak.
Customer: Acha, theek hai sir. Acha ek do cheez aap mujhe bata dijiye, aap connect kar hi liya hai toh maine, aapne kuch buyleads utha rahe hain, nayi category ki, solar panels hain, poly crystalline solar panels, a Wari solar panels, Loom solar panels, ye hain hamare paas?
Executive: Haan ji ye sab hai toh.
Customer: Saare product hain Wari aur Loom bhi ye brand hai kya?
Executive: Haan haan haan haan haan, company ka naam hai, company ka naam hai, Wari bhi company ka naam hai, Loom bhi company ka naam hai.
Customer: Toh agar main ye category apne product mein add kar dungi toh aapko chalega na sir, iski buylead enquiry aayegi?
Executive: Haan dijiye koi dikkat nahi hai, woh toh phir bahut acha hota hai, kyunki ya toh toh dekhta hoon woh anagal company ka bhi enquiry dalte hain, woh Wari solar panel mein, Loom, HR solar, ye sab available hai abhi.
Customer: Acha hai na apne paas, theek hai toh main ye product mein add kar dungi.
Customer: Aur rest toh last time update hui thi sir jo maine aapko bataya tha, usme kya kya aapne abhi tak karna shuru kiya hai, kaisa response aa raha hai, kuch batao aap mujhe?
Executive: Hmm woh aapne toh jo sikha diya tha us din ki din mein, uske baad se toh usi woh buylead and lead manager ke hisab se main toh lead ko le raha hoon aur lead ke lead ke saath baat cheet bhi kar raha hoon chatting mein, waha pe IndiaMART ki chatting mein hi.
Customer: Acha, usse call wall matlab baat ho rahi hai customer se, kuch response mil raha hai unka?
Executive: Response toh mil raha hai kuch. Abhi thoda rough upar ja raha hai, thoda thoda aise jaise woh algorithm badh raha hai thoda, uska reach badh raha hai.
Customer: Hmm badhega woh dheere dheere badhega. Aur aap thoda sa bas na lead manager proper follow up rakhiyega sir. Matlab activity karne ke baad aap jitna marzi WhatsApp kariye, call kariye, jo aapko karna hai aap kariye jaise follow karna hai, lekin proper lead manager ka use bahut zaruri hai.
Customer: Ji ji.
Customer: Taki aapki location preference bane aur category preference bane.
Executive: Ji ji ji woh toh main kar raha hoon.
Customer: Haan ji sir, baki toh Mandal sir se mera baat hua hi hai, isme hum package bhi badhayenge unhone bola tha, but pehle uska response milna zaruri hai, aapke upar hai sir aap sale nikal ke doge unko toh woh bilkul invest karenge. Aur usme pata hai aapki help hogi ek tarah se, jaise abhi aapki complete dependency buylead pe hai.
Executive: Haan haan.
Customer: Toh main jo unko naya package bata rahi hoon na, woh chaar service ka package hai woh. Usme kya hoga aapki calls aur enquiry ka flow badhega. Jis bhi shehar se aap buylead utha rahe ho na, toh waha abhi hamari visibility top 30, top 40 mein aati hai. Ab jaise hum top mein jayenge kisi bhi do product ya teen product ko leke, catalog toh pura waise hi chalega jaisa chal raha hai, lekin woh do teen product ko leke hum higher listing karte hain. Toh aapke jo bhi main product rahenge, haan uski calls aur enquiry ka flow badh jayega. Toh aapke paas zyada data hoga, zyada follow ups honge, zyada ROI hoga. Aisa kaam karta hai sir. Lekin uske liye aap, aap jitna confidence de paoge sir ko, ki haan sir ab hume next level leke chalna chahiye isko, toh hi woh aage badhenge. Kyunki unke paas na time nahi hai isko dekhne ke liye. Aur aap jitna behtar, isliye main aaya hoon uska main dekh raha hoon ye, ye wala hissa. Jitna aap ache se dekhoge isme se sale wagera nikaloge aap, utni hi main bhi aapki help kar paungi sir, chahe woh service se ho chahe kaise bhi ho.
Executive: Ji ji ji ji.
Customer: Baki calls answer karo sir, calls ka ratio dekhiye gir raha hai apna. Calls aapke paas bhi toh aati hai, is number pe bhi toh aati hai.
Executive: Nahi nahi call, call is number pe directly nahi hai, call toh maximum us sir ke number pe hi jaata hai.
Customer: Sir suno main batati hoon, dono number map hai aapka, theek hai? Aur jo call aati hai na, woh dono number pe simultaneously aati hai. Jisne bhi pehle answer kar diya, haan dusre number se woh cut jaati hai. Theek hai? Aapko main ek number, aapko ye number WhatsApp pe hai na, secondary wala?
Executive: Acha acha.
Executive: Aap aapka number?
Customer: Mera number, haan matlab mera aapka WhatsApp number kaunsa hai?
Executive: Haan woh us din diya tha na, us din video call mein baat kiya tha usme.
Customer: Aah ek second. Batao kya phir se?
Customer: Haan sir batana ek bar.
Executive: 7076
Customer: 7076
Executive: 186
Customer: Haan one second mil gaya mujhe. 1866882 hai na?
Executive: Right right right 882 hai.
Customer: Ye dekho sir maine aapko ek number bheja hai. Aapko jab bhi IndiaMART se call aayega na, is number se aayega, aapko is number ko as a IndiaMART buyer ke naam se save karna hai. Acha.
Customer: Jaise maan lijiye aapne Mandal sir ka number Mandal sir ke naam se save kiya hoga, mera number Shreya ke naam se save kiya hoga, waise hi 08042994299 aapko IndiaMART buyer ke naam se save karna hai. Toh jab bhi aapko is number se call jayega aap answer karna. Theek hai?
Executive: Ji. Okay.
Customer: Okay sir, baki aapka jo ye video meeting ka request tha sir, woh main close kar rahi hoon. Toh aapke primary mail, galti se ho gaya tha mujhse. Koi baat nahi sir. Agar aap chaho toh hum kar bhi sakte hain, that is not the issue. Aapke na primary mail ID pe ek feedback jayega mere liye. Toh aap usko satisfy mark kar dijiyega ya jaisa bhi aapka experience ho aap uske basis pe aap mark kar dijiyega usko. Okay okay okay, thank you madam, okay.
Executive: Haan ji.
Customer: Band kar rahi hoon sir main, theek hai sir?
Executive: Okay okay.
Customer: Okay. Thank you. Thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer opened a video meet request by mistake.

- Wants to know about the last update.

- Calls ratio is decreasing.



Resolution:

- Executive confirmed all is well with catalog.

- Executive confirmed using lead manager.

- Executive will get a feedback mail.

- Executive was informed about saving the IndiaMART buyer number.



Next Steps: 

- Issue resolved.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, catalog, lead manager, follow up, calls
